013package org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart;
014
015import java.util.*;
016
017/**
018 * A list of {@link NamedAttribute} objects.
019 *
020 * <ul class='seealso'>
021 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.HttpParts">HTTP Parts</a>
022 * </ul>
023 */
024public class NamedAttributeMap extends LinkedHashMap<String,NamedAttribute> {
025
026   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
027   // Static
028   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
029
030   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
031
032   /**
033    * Static creator.
034    *
035    * @return An empty list.
036    */
037   public static NamedAttributeMap create() {
038      return new NamedAttributeMap();
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Static creator.
043    *
044    * @param values The initial contents of this list.
045    * @return An empty list.
046    */
047   public static NamedAttributeMap of(NamedAttribute...values) {
048      return create().add(values);
049   }
050
051   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
052   // Instance
053   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
054
055   /**
056    * Constructor.
057    */
058   public NamedAttributeMap() {
059   }
060
061   /**
062    * Copy constructor.
063    *
064    * @param copyFrom The list to copy from.
065    */
066   public NamedAttributeMap(NamedAttributeMap copyFrom) {
067      super();
068      putAll(copyFrom);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Creates a copy of this list.
073    *
074    * @return A new copy of this list.
075    */
076   public NamedAttributeMap copy() {
077      return new NamedAttributeMap(this);
078   }
079
080   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
081   // Properties
082   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
083
084   /**
085    * Appends the specified rest matcher classes to the list.
086    *
087    * @param values The values to add.
088    * @return This object.
089    */
090   public NamedAttributeMap add(NamedAttribute...values) {
091      for (NamedAttribute v : values)
092         put(v.getName(), v);
093      return this;
094   }
095}
